title: Communication
summary: Build confident speaking, listening, digital communication, and service skills that help you lead and collaborate effectively.

resources.title: Toastmasters – Speech Tips
resources.description: Practical guidance for talks and meetings.

resources.title: Purdue OWL – Presentations
resources.description: Slide design, delivery, and audience tips.

resources.title: TED-Ed – Public Speaking
resources.description: Short videos and lessons on communicating ideas.

modules.title: Set Communication Goals
modules.prompt: List two strengths and two growth areas for how you communicate at home, school, and Scouts.

modules.title: Plan a Talk
modules.instructions: Draft a speech or presentation outline with purpose, audience, main points, visuals, and practice plan.

modules.title: Deliver & Reflect
modules.instructions: Give your talk to a real audience. Summarize how it went, feedback received, and adjustments for next time.

modules.title: Practice Active Listening
modules.instructions: Review at least two resources on listening. Capture three techniques and one scenario to apply them.

modules.title: Digital Communication Choices
modules.instructions: Compare three digital platforms (email, chat, social, etc.). Track tone, privacy, and best-use cases.

modules.title: Communication Service
modules.instructions: Support 2+ hours of communication service (emcee event, write newsletter, run meeting). Log tasks, audience, and outcomes.
